## StylesInjectOptions.useConstructableStylesheet property

Use Constructable Stylesheet method of the styles injection to DOM if the browser supports Constructable Stylesheet. Default true.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
useConstructableStylesheet?: boolean;
```
